scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ seated on a throne, holding a globe and a cross, with his right hand raised in a gesture of blessing. To his left, the Virgin Mary kneels, her hands crossed over her chest, with a halo. Above her, two angels descend, holding a crown, which they are about to place on her head. The background is a deep blue, adorned with golden stars, suggesting a celestial setting. A red, patterned canopy is visible above Christ. The figures are positioned within an architectural framework suggested by a golden, patterned floor and a row of arched openings in the background.
